text: mema gataya dhiwarayin wisin bhawithawedi yodana lada gatayak bawada pradeshawasin thahawuru kara thibuni.
ema pasale sisu sisuwiyan kihipadeneku pamanak ada (16da) pasal pamina athi bawath, sesu siyalu dena pasal pamina nomathi bawath dakagatha hakiwiya.

ee sathuta thawakalika bawa kawiya pasak karagath bawa apata awasana padayen pahadili weyi.aadaraya hade sangawalowama paseka lainnatama enne nahaoba mage nowana bawa pasak kala nisaperada windi ganja suruttuwe suwaya suruttuwe awasanayath samangama awasana wana heyin eya thawakalika suwayak bawa kawiya awabodha karaganiyi.

me janathawata ingrisi adhyapanayak di owun thamange suwacha kikaru sewakayan kara bahuthara sinhalayata ihalin osawa thabimen sinhalaya palanaya kirima sandaha thamanta me ratenma athawassan thana gatha haki bawada ingrisinta awabodha wiya.

ape wishabijaya katha kiyanna rusiya.
eekadhipathi rajyayanta ches champiyansla, piyano prawignyayan, nyashtika injinerawan yanadin athidadi kala hakiyi.

ma tharappu pela naga ihala mahale pihiti mage priyathama kamarayata giyemi.eya kadimata sakasu kada kamarayaki.potikowa matha wu balkaniyata piwisimata haki bawin ma meyata alum kalemi.ma kuda kala bawitha kala kuda ada wenuwata thabu wishala ada harunu kota kamaraya kudakala wu lesama pawathi.ma ada matha ala wunemi.

gewannata thibena akusal pramanaya wadi wenna wadi wenna, wipaka dime awasthawath wadikaranawa.

paranawithana mahatha meheyawana nawa arahadi pahan pujawa 9.15 sita rupawahini thulin bauddha wehera wihara sthana narambaima.shri wijayasundararama purana wiharasthanaye poda perawaru 6.00 sita pasuda perawaru 6.00 dakwa dana, shila, bhawana dharmadeshana athulu wadasatahan pawathwe.

ostreliyanu pila dawantha lakunu sankhyawak kara ragena giya aarambhaka pithikariniya nikol boltan lakunu 113k ras kirimata samathwu athara madapela pithikariniya elis peri pandu 77kadi hathare pahara 7k saha haye paharak samaga nodawi wegawath lakunu 77k ras kirimata samathwuwaya.

diyaniyage aabharanayak ukaskara mudal yodawa wagakala akkara thunaka lunu wagawa warshawa hethuwen winashawi yama nisa sith thawulata path habarana – puwakpitiya pradeshaye gowi mahathek pereda (12) siya diwi hani karagena thibe.

uthuru palatha thula siwil aarakshaka balakaya ha anekuth aarakshaka ansha wisin pawathwagena yana pera pasal palath sabhawa yatathata pawaraganima sambandhayen yapanaya,kayithadi pihiti uthuru palath sankirnayedi palath sabha manthriwarun sakachjawata lakkaranu labiya.

ada pemwathunge dinaya nohoth walantayin dinayayi.
esema mehi kriyakarin gananawakma nithiya magin athadanguwata ganima sadaha warenthu lada pudgalayan.
hari kiyannako ithin kawda kiyala ee ganu lamaya..
ee sambandhayenda jawipe nayakayan sakachchawaka niratha wiya.
ada eyath natha.
pasu­giya dawa­saka paththara maha­ge­da­rata goda­wa­duna ohu sanni­we­dana madhya adhya­ya­naya uga­nwa­min madhya­we­din nirma­naya kara­nnata uthsaha karana tharuna guru­wa­ra­yek.

2015 janawari 8 daාta pera thibu maha parimana dushanaya wanchawa dan nathi bawa aththa karanayaki.
api ehenam ki denekuta pihiyen aninna oonada..?
eya walakwalamin thama gal penwamin pare gaman kirimata tharam hasiya nirbhitha una heyin ape eka mayilakatawath athawarayak kirimata mohinita nohaki wiya.
bari wuna ayata sahena amanushika widihata karadara karala thiyenawa samahara thirisannu.
mata atha bala sasthara kiyanna puluwan kiyala ee ayata kiwwa.
thawa dennek pas.
onna oya antha deka gana hithala thamayi katayuthu karanna wenne..
kantha niyojanaya sandaha palath palana aayathanawala saha palath sabha aayathanawalawath aduma gane me nithi nodammoth kantha nayikawo deshapalanayata bihiwenne naha.
eeka neme kello athsan ganna ehema aawe natheyi....eeka neme ayiye mata maru niws ekak thibuna oyage komentuwaka....
ewita owun karana ladde ee bhikshunge awabodhaya hela dakima pinisa dharmaye saka upadawana prashna naga margapala pirihena bawata pulul mathayak pracharaya kirima yi.
"katada ithin ara himaliyata misa" amma kiwwa.
ehenam ithin duka liyana subhash mage mamage wayase.
nawa yauwun daruwage hasirima pilibadawa oba kalabalayenda?
meya saralawa wataha ganimata sathun (paribhojakayin) wisin shaka (nishpakadayin) ka damanu labanne yayi kalpana karanna.
+ mata ba..
aran yannata giyada magaharuna jiwithaya
aathmika sancharayan ho thrasajanaka kriyakarakam?
pura hadata pem karanawa.....
mama kshethrayata ekathu wenne narthana shilpiniyak widihatayi.
wayasa giyath oonama gemakata ottuya.....
bas nawathumpolata giyawita magi janathawata me athdakima laba ganna bari weyi.
eeth thamuse ayiyata kiyala pawula kadakappal karayi kiyala gani bayayi.
widesha yanthraya samanga sasandana, apage yanthrayaka mila anupathaya karya sadhanaya wadi ya.
ee rajjuruwanta rajadrohakala ek soraku atha paya kan nasa kapa oruwak pitala yatihan bala alaha.
tikak prewsama hithata aran yanna ooni hariyak thamayi me payinas kale haraha gamana.
ohu mathak kara dena karunu osse thama puthun shuddha wanthayin bawa prakasha karamin an ayata awalada nagima ehidi dakagatha haki wiya.
diwayine sthana kihipayaka di sidu wu pipirim siddhi malawa pilibanda soya balimata janadhipathi maithi්rapala sirisena mahatha wishesha thi්rapudgala parikshana mandalayak path kara thibe.
ohu eda je.aar.ta padam igannuwe bandaranayakage aashirwadayen kalaniyata tharanga karalaya.
pradhana widhayaka ...

‘bauddha palakayaku pilibanda apekshawa wisheshayen sangha samajaye sitina deshapalana washayen kriyakari bhikshun wahansela warin wara prakashayata path karannaki. 1950 gananwala muladi bauddha thorathuru parikshana komisamata sambandha wu gihi pawidi ugaththu nidahasin pasu lankawe me sihinaya mulinma mathu kalaha.
dewanna nam dukata hethuwayi.
dahasakuth me - sith parana bana wadum - rawum garahum iwasa dara numbaa hunna nihanda wa...
gaman wilashayeth yam wagakimsahagatha gathiyak thibuna.
ese nathi wuwahoth wankagiriya nirmanaya karana obe saba jiwithaye bohomayak de bilidimata sidu wenawa.
prashna kirimedi heliwuye ohu indiyawe sita amarikawata yana kristhiyani pujakawarayaku bawath, ohu kiyawamin sitiye bayibalaye demala pariwarthanayak bawathya.
sthiwirayan wahanse namak me siduwima dakina aakaraya pilibanda dana ganimata labima bohoma sathutak.
ohu 1876di athi wu durbhikshayen pidawata path wuwanta aahara pana sapayamin sahanadhara da laba dunneya.
athupatharin thanin thana diswana ahaskusa thula mini kata men didulana tharaka ya.

owunta kamabima saha mudalhadal denu labe.

tharuniyak biyawadda ayata lingika aparadhayak sidukirime aramunin ema tharuniya polambaawa ganimata thath kale yayi chodana labu sakakaruwakuta erehiwa wadduwa polisiya pawaru naduwaka wibhagaya panadura mahesthrath aar. es. ee. disanayaka mahatha wisin kal damana ladi.wadduwa galu pare dhawanaya wu paudgalika basriyaka siti tharuniyakage chayarupayak kamarawak sahitha jangama durakathanayakin chayarupagatha kara aya biyawadda athawarayak kirimata thath kale yayi sakakaru chodana laba sitiyeya.sakakaru athadanguwata gena adhikaranayata idiripath kale wadduwa polisiye sarayan sugath pranandu saha kosthapal anuruddha palihena (77179) yana niladharin wisini.rupiyal 5000ka sharira apayak matha withthikaru muda harini..

adhikarana katayuthu hethuwen woharika warthawa manthriwarunta denna ba | dinamina niwasa adhikarana katayuthu hethuwen woharika warthawa manthriwarunta denna ba adhikarana katayuthu hethuwen woharika warthawa manthriwarunta denna ba bandumkara siddhiya sambandhayen danatamath adhikarana katayuthu aarambha kara athi heyin ha idiriyedi nithi katayuthu sapirimata athi heyin bandumkara siddhiya alala maha bankuwa nikuth kala woharika warthawa parlimenthu manthriwarunta labadiya nohaki bawa kathanayaka karu jayasuriya mahatha eeye (07) niwedanaya keleya.
kaya da, wachanaya da, manasa da piliwethin sadenuwa atha.
abhyanthara le galimak deha abhyantharayata sima wana athara meya anathurakadi ho sansthanika maha dhamaniye wu wistharanayak pupura yame di siduwiya hakiya.
